Name: ABSOLUTE
About the game: ABSOLUTE is an escape game. Make use of any available tools to solve the puzzles and clear all the levels. Inspired by escape room games. Like a classic escape room game, but on a larger scale. Key Feature - Classic escape game, finding tools, and make use of them to clear the levels. - Full escape puzzle, no mini-game. - Unique puzzle on every level.
